import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react'; import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { createProfile } from '../../actions/profile'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = ({ history }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', youtube: '', linkedin: '', instagram: '' }); const [dispaySocialLink, toggleSocialLink] = useState(false); const dispatch = useDispatch(() => createProfile()); //destructuring const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, instagram, youtube } = formData; const onChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createProfile(formData, history)); }; return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

onSubmit(e)}>
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{dispaySocialLink && (
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
)} Go Back
); }; export default withRouter(CreateProfile);
